data.title: Blood Supply to the Knee : Wheeless' Textbook of Orthopaedics
data.meta_description: - Discussion:     - blood supply to skin around the knee is random (as opposed to axial)     - there are multiple small overlapping vessels that are interrupted by multiple small incisions;     - random supply is sustained by both intrinsic and extrinsic sources;          - intrinsic contributors to ...
